page.title: 09GELLI RHAIDD UCHAF FARM
page.content: As we walked up the lane to the farm the sun was beating down on us. Rees went ahead to tell his parents that we were coming. His mother came out with some orange pop for us. Then we went to look at the cows. There were{Limousel}cows which came from{France}and{Rhondda Herd Welsh {Black,both of which are beef cows. Then we went over to the shed where the sheep are sheared.We saw Rees's brother shear two sheep and then let them run outside.He gave the sheep's wool to Rees to roll up.Rees's sister showed us how to roll up the fleece. She told us to put the dirty side on the outside and to fold the sides in. Then Rees's brother caught a sheep which he had sheared and put it in a pen on its own,ready for slaughter. After that we said thankyou to Mr Jones and his wife and we walked back.
